content: I think I'll start with a simple star rating system and see how it goes. I like the idea of a 5-star system, where 5 stars is "loved it" and 1 star is "didn't enjoy." I might also add a few notes about what I liked or didn't like about the book. Do you think it's a good idea to include a section in my journal for DNFs (did not finish) or books that I abandoned?
